feast, esp. one observed by a pilgrimage (Ex 23:14, Ex 23:17):

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: special feast to the golden calf Ex 32:5 (J; where there was a sacred dance v:Ex 23:19); a feast in the 8th month observed by Jeroboam in place of the feast of the 7th month in Judah 1Ki 12:32, 1Ki 12:33; pilgrim feast proposed by Moses Ex 10:9 (JE); feast at Shiloh Ju Jdg 21:19. Elsewhere

definitions.title: b.
